title: Google Cloud Spanner datasource
description: A schema defining Google Cloud Spanner datasource

client_email.label: Client Email
client_email.description: Enter the Google Cloud service account client email
client_email.hint: You can get this from your Google Cloud Console under Service Accounts.

project_id.label: Project ID
project_id.hint: This is the ID of your Google Cloud project where the Spanner instance is hosted.

private_key.label: Private Key
private_key.description: Enter the Google Cloud service account private key

instance_id.label: Instance ID
instance_id.description: Enter the Google Cloud Spanner instance ID
